trans-unit.source: Defines constants that represent the ways a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> can be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Define as constantes que representam as formas um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> pode ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to indicate whether the nodes or node-labels of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Esta enumeração é utilizada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para indicar se os nós ou etiquetas de nó de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>são desenhados de proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> is drawn by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> é desenhada pelo sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: All elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> node are drawn manually, including icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Todos os elementos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> nós são desenhados manualmente, incluindo ícones, as caixas de verificação, mais e menos inicia e as linhas que ligam os nós.

trans-unit.source: The label portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> nodes are drawn manually.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta parte a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> nós são desenhados manualmente.

trans-unit.source: Other node elements are drawn by the operating system, including icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Outros elementos de nó são desenhados pelo sistema operativo, incluindo ícones, as caixas de verificação, mais e menos inicia e as linhas que ligam os nós.
